Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2009 10:00PM lini57 wrote: Oh, how she loved her girls, her John, her life.  You're beautiful, Dammit!!  You made everyone feel that way, Deb.  Just beautiful.  Most pure of heart and soul. You will be missed. We're all so blessed to have had you in our lives.  I learned so much from you, Thank you, lini
Posts.Title: Alaska Deb is our newest Angel. Traci-----TripNeg 4753
